Features-Unimproved -- Male Half-Orc Seasoned Cleric
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Strong: +1 Strength Step
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/heavy armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d10
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Repair: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d12 Occult: (sma) d8
Languages: Common; Dwarven; Gnoll; Orc
Skill Notes:
Intimidating: +1 Intimidation Step
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/heavy armor or shield
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0 Deity: Norgorber (Evil)
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 2; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (2 points): Barbarian; Fighter Hindrances: Death Wish; Hesitant; Jealous; Stubborn Half-Orc Abilities: Darkvision; Intimidating; Orc Ferocity; Outsider; Strong
Feature Notes:
Barbarian: Has Armor Restriction, Fast, and Rage features
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Darkvision: R10" Ignores illumination penalties
Death Wish: Will risk death for a valued goal
Enraged: Ignores 2 points of Wound penalties and all fatigue penalties
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 6 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 8/+d6
Armor: None Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Javelin (d6+d6 R4"); Ranseur (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fast: +2 Pace
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Orc Ferocity: +1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Fury: Gains +1 Strength Step and may only make Wild Attacks during rage
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Martial Flexibility: May gain the benefits of a combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Rage: Has Fury, Enraged, and Reckless Abandon features for 5 rd at will or when Shaken or wounded (Smarts neg); suffers 1 level of fatigue afterward until 1 hr rest
Reckless Abandon: Critical failure on an attack hits a random target or self
